Room.Name: Before a massive cave, on the mountainside
Room.Description: Barely managing to climb the enormous mountainside, you seem to stumble on to a large creation, set in cold stone. Before you is a magnificent sight, a massive hole has been torn into the rock face of this mountain, forming a dark cave. The foliage which surrounds the mountain seems to be parted and destroyed around the cave, giving it an eerie, bare appearance.

Room.Name: Within a slightly-lit cave
Room.Description: Small rays of sunlight beam in from the south, shedding light to a small portion of the cave. The rocks here range from a smooth gray to a slightly dusted black color. Though not a single drop of moisture can be seen along the walls. The ground below your feet is rather rough, it is quite obvious that few, if any men, have passed through here recently. The tunnel continues to the north, and exits to the south.

Room.Name: Within a dark cave
Room.Description: It's pitch-black in here, and the only faint bit of light you can see, shines from the south. The rocks are almost undetectable, but carry the same texture and color, a smooth pale gray, to a dusted almost coal color. Not a drop of moisture can be seen as these tunnels look very bare. The tunnel continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: Before a small intersection, within a dark cave
Room.Description: Not a strand of light is here, though you begin to feel as though you are being watched in the cold, dark cave. At times, you seem to hear a whisper or chuckle, though it all sounds so faint, that it seems like your mind is playing tricks on you. The rocks around here are a bit darker in shade then the one's seen before the entrance of the cave. As you feel the cold, rock surface, you seem to spot a small marking on the wall of the rock face, it's small in design, below it point two arrows, one to the east, and the other to the west.

Room.Name: Along a thin tunnel, within a dark cave
Room.Description: This tunnel is extremely thin, though much like the rest of the cave, it's very high, the size of at least three adult human males. The ground below you is a little smoother, leading you to believe that someone has been through here recently. Twisted, jagged rocks protrude from the walls, it's as through something is warning you, to pass no further.

Room.Name: Along a thin tunnel, within a dark cave
Room.Description: This tunnel is extremely thin, though much like the rest of the cave, it's very high, the size of at least three adult human males. The ground below you is a little smoother, leading you to believe that someone has been through here recently. The thin tunnel twists into a sudden curve, you may go north deeper into the tunnel, or back west.

Room.Name: Along an odd tunnel, within a dark cave
Room.Description: You stand along an odd tunnel, it's a complete semi-circle to every extent. You can only imagine that some form of sorcery was used to shape it. Dark rocks, all around you, seem to be taking on a reddish-hue. The air around you seems quite humid. The tunnel continues to the north. To the south, the tunnel begins to grow thinner.

Room.Name: Along an odd tunnel, within a cave
Room.Description: You stand along an odd tunnel, it's a complete semi-circle to every extent. You can only imagine that some form of sorcery was used to shape it. Dark rocks, all around you, seem to be taking on a reddish-hue. The air around you seems quite humid. The tunnel continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: Before a sharp turn, in the dark cave
Room.Description: You stand before a sharp turn in the tunnel. A large, jagged wall is before you, it's entire surface marked with etchings of odd designs and runes. The rocks here seem to take on a reddish hue, emitting the warm air around you. Something eerie is about. You feel as though you are being watched again. The tunnel twists to the east and heads back south.

Room.Name: Along a very small tunnel, in the dark cave
Room.Description: Fit for only the smallest of creatures, this room forces anything taller than an imp or sidhe to duck or crawl. Unlike the majority of the rocks seen at the entrance of the cave, the rocks here emit a faint orange glow. The tunnel stretches to the east and west.

Room.Name: Along a very small tunnel, in the dark cave
Room.Description: This tunnel is fit for only the smallest of creatures, anything taller than an imp or sidhe will be forced to duck or crawl. Unlike the majority of rocks seen at the entrance of the cave, here they emit a faint orange glow. To the northern wall of the tunnel, some rocks seem to be broken, chipped and missing, leading you to believe that their may be something beyond the obvious. The faint sound of water dripping, echoes from the east. The tunnel continues to the east and west.

Room.Name: A dark pool of water, before an enormous cavern
Room.Description: A small stream of fresh, mountain water, trickles into a pool that has been freshly dug into the eastern side of the wall. As the cold, fresh water touches the pool it turns ebony. The walls of the cave are a deep, warm, ebony... they are set in a intricate pattern along the southern portion of the tunnel, circling around a massive hole, which leads into some hideous cavern. Towards the south the faint sound of chuckling and laughter can be heard.

Room.Name: Within a cavern
Room.Description: Small, almost devilish creatures swarm about you, everywhere, they seem to be quite unkempt... rags and trash, litter the ground. They seem to live here with delight, painting strange, yet horrific images on the walls, some of which depicting cities, being ravaged, which you recognize. These small creatures seem to thrive in this cavern. The cavern continues to the east, west, and east, though exits through the north.

Room.Name: Within a cavern
Room.Description: This cavern is filthy, and littered with rags and trash. Something odd catches your eye, towards the north-western edge of the wall hangs a deceased sidhe, tormented and skinned, set up for some sort of game involving darts. These devilish creature's are all about you, but they only seem to eye you curiously, as though they hold back, in fear, to strike at you for entering their home.

Room.Name: Within a cavern
Room.Description: Creeping further into the hideous cavern, you notice that the imps seem to have no care in all of Shadar about their appearance. Filthy, smug grins seem to be permanently plastered to their small, petite faces. Though, they obviously lack the morale, and spirit to do anything about you invading their privacy. The cavern continues to the north and east.

Room.Name: Within a cavern
Room.Description: These small, hideous creatures pester you as a rodent would, following your every movement. Gathering in packs, watching you move about, studying each footstep carefully. Garbage piled to your ankles is all about, but imps just don't seem to care, indulging in this disgusting sight, they thrive in this waste. The cavern continues to the east, west and north.

Room.Name: Within a cavern
Room.Description: These small, hideous creatures pester you as a rodent would, following your every movement. Gathering in packs, watching you move about, studying each footstep carefully. Garbage piled to your ankles is all about, but imps just don't seem to care, indulging in this disgusting sight, they thrive in this waste. The cavern continues to the north and west.

Room.Name: Within a cavern
Room.Description: A small part of the imps culture can be seen here, strange paintings adorn the east wall, paintings of a small city, being invaded underground, through what seem to be the sewers. Though still, the same disgusting scene, of trash tossed about can be seen here, like every other portion of the cavern. To the south and west, the cavern continues.

Room.Name: A hidden passage, in the dark cave
Room.Description: Stumbling through the rocks in the wall, you manage to find yourself before a dark passage, in the caves. Obviously man-made, the ground is paved well, stretching north, for at least a few leagues. The rocks around here, are squared and well-kempt, carrying a smooth texture, and a lovely, granite color. The faint sound of footsteps can be heard all around you. The passage continues to the north.

Room.Name: A hidden passage, in the dark cave
Room.Description: The passage stretches as far as the eye can see, snaking it's way to the north, obviously fashioned by some, well-experienced race. It seems to slope downward just a bit, with each footstep, it's as though this passage takes you, below the surface of Shadar. The faint sound of footsteps grows louder to the north, it's as though something very large is here. The passage continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: A small clearing, along the hidden passage, in the dark cave
Room.Description: You seem to have stumbled unto a small clearing, along the hidden passage. Dark ebony stones have been set along the walls, though as you peer ahead, the passage seems to grow darker and darker. The air is humid, and the faint sound of footsteps can be heard all around you, you feel quite certain, that something very large lurks in this part of the cave. The passage continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: Deep within a hidden passage, in the dark cave
Room.Description: Rather thin compared to the majority of tunnels found in this cave, this part of the passage seems to twist on and on. Though just as you begin to walk through, taking little notice of your surroundings, you manage to spot something strange on the rock face. It seems that a few stones on the western side of the passage are broken and cracked. Humidity is very fierce around this part of the passage. The passage continues to the north, and leads to a small clearing, towards the south.

Room.Name: Along a secret passage, in the dark cave
Room.Description: You seem to have found a secret passage in the dark cave. Bits of broken stone litter the ground, though unlike the dark stones seen earlier, these one emit a gentle, orange light. Taking in a deep breath of air, your lungs begin to burn, the air around you is disgustingly humid. Towards the west, you hear the echo of metal being smashed against metal, as though someone or something is hard at work.

Room.Name: Before a fiery cavern, in the dark cave
Room.Description: You stand before an enormous cavern, filled with fire. The towering pillars of flame, seen inside, seem to light this part of the passage. The stones around you are unlike any other's you have seen before, they range from a dark emerald, to a majestic crimson in color. The sound of metal being smashed against metal resonates all around you. The passage continues to the east, and enter's a colossal cavern towards the west.

Room.Name: Inside a fiery cavern, in the dark cave
Room.Description: The cavern is simply amazing... crimson stalactites hang from the ceiling of the cavern, while set at all corners are enormous, pillars of flame. The cavern is well lit, and seems to be the home of some enormous titan. Massive hammers, thrice the size of an ordinary one you've seen hang along the walls, towards the north, you can hear the sound of metal, crashing against metal, grow louder and louder.

Room.Name: The Forge of Ur'Tazi
Room.Description: An anvil, crafted from a smooth, ebony metal is before you. Standing just behind it, is a massive titan, twice the size of any titan you have ever seen in Shadar. Along the walls of this cavern, hang assorted tools, used by a blacksmith. Each tool, being at least thrice the size of any ordinary tool a blacksmith would use. Assorted weapon's and armor hang along the walls of the forge, though they each are so large, that only a titan could hope to use them.

Room.Name: Along a secret passage, in the dark cave
Room.Description: The atmosphere around you, suddenly grows darker... a cold wind begins to sweep through the tunnel. The rocks here are jagged, twisted, and deformed... ebony stalactites hang from the ceiling of the passage. Sloping further and further down, you can only hope that this passage takes you to some place of safety. The passage continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: Along a secret passage, in the dark cave
Room.Description: The air around you is cold... Yet not a drop of moisture can be seen along the rough, jagged walls of the passage. Ebony stalactites hang from the ceiling, their sharp points, hanging by little more then a thread. The passage seems to be curving towards the north, leading deeper and deeper into the cave. Down and up the passage etches, taking you deeper and deeper, below the surface of Orthos.

NPC.name: lynchre titan abyss
NPC.description: A massive red skinned colasses with sulfuric breath, black eyes, and a slick black mane. He wears snugg fitting armor on his body, and has a massive bloody axe hung at his waist. His hand rests on the axe, ready to pull it out and massacre any threat that comes his way.
NPC.longDescription: A giant abyss stands here hammering weapons into place.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Flying Haste Regeneration DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Larnest beast spectre specter ghost
NPC.description: Larnest is a medium sized dark spectre. He seems to draw in light and engulf it in the darkness that surrounds him. He has eyes of red and they are glaring malevolently at you.
NPC.longDescription: A spectre floats here, waiting to attack it's next victim.
NPC.affectedBy: Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Flying Haste Berserk Regeneration DetectIllusion

NPC.name: ghost
NPC.description: This is the ghost of an abyss titan. He was slain here and refuses to leave. He wanders the halls here forever in search of the person who killed him to take out his revenge.
NPC.longDescription: The ghost of an abyss titan wanders here.
NPC.affectedBy: Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Sneak Flying PassDoor Haste DetectIllusion

NPC.name: fire beast
NPC.description: Lynchre's pet fire beast is glaring at you for intruding his master's home. His firey red skin seems to glow a brighter red as he bares his bloody teeth at you. His eyes are a pure black, it feels like you are being pulled into the darkness as you look into them.
NPC.longDescription: A fire beast waits patiently for it's next victim.
NPC.affectedBy: Sanctuary ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Haste Regeneration DetectIllusion

NPC.name: imp
NPC.description: This imp is the servant of the fire beasts here. He is contantly trying to make sure the beasts are well fed and happy. He is currently looking for his next beast to please, so as not to make Lynchre unhappy with hi
NPC.longDescription: A dirty little imp is poking you with a stick.
NPC.affectedBy: Sanctuary ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Sneak Flying Haste Regeneration DetectIllusion

NPC.name: mimsa ghost
NPC.description: Mimsa fell to the harsh hand of Lynchre ages ago. This elven ghost haunts Lynchre to make his living as unpleasant as possible. She is always watching and waiting for him to come to his demise so she can come to peace with her life.
NPC.longDescription: Mimsa is here haunting the halls.

NPC.name: ghost bungo
NPC.description: A halfling of great stature in his community haunts here in his unrest. Slain by the powerful Lynchre. He does all he can to make it a pain for Lynchre to live in the mortal world while Bungo and his companions are forced to be in the world of the undead.
NPC.longDescription: Bungo is roaming the halls in his ghostly form.

NPC.name: ganisha ghost
NPC.description: Ganisha, a slain dwarf, haunts this cave not because of riches or mining, but because he was slain here. Ganisha will wait until the end of time to see his death avenged and see Lynchre beg for mercy as he grasps to the last breaths of his life.
NPC.longDescription: Ganisha terries here before moving on to haunt his captor.

NPC.name: ghost centra
NPC.description: Centra is constantly banging around and tryng to create a loathsome environment for Lynchre to live in. She is a slain storm giant and waits for her vengence like the others.

NPC.name: ghost Hamil
NPC.description: Hamil is displeased with being in this rotten cave, but will not leave until his death is avenged. He was once a handsome sidhe with an important job and family, but is now a worthless ghost.
NPC.longDescription: Hamil is glaring at his surroundings.

Item.Name: blood ore torso armor
Item.LongDescription: A piece of bloody armor sits here untouched.

Item.Name: blood ore helmet helm metal
Item.LongDescription: A piece of blood covered metal lies here.

Item.Name: blood ore spear metal
Item.LongDescription: A long piece of thin metal lays here covered in blood.
Item.ExtraFlags: Dark Evil Bless AntiGood AntiNeutral NoRemove TwoHands

Item.Name: blood ore axe metal
Item.LongDescription: A large piece of metal with a wooden handle lays here in fresh blood.

Item.Name: Justice Nature
Item.LongDescription: A vine, glowing green, is here.

Item.Name: fire collar
Item.LongDescription: A circle of fire lys here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Evil AntiGood AntiNeutral NoRemove

Item.Name: map ur'tazi caves
Item.ShortDescription: a old map not for mortals
Item.LongDescription: A old map is here, better sacrifice it
